585640.name: Shiness: The Lightning Kingdom - Maherian Language Pack
585640.description:
With this free Maherian language pack, you’ll have the option to replace all the English voice acting in Shiness: The Lightning Kingdom with Maherian voice acting!

Shiness is an Action-RPG that transports you to an enchanting universe which, ever since the fracturing of planet Mahera, is doomed to destruction. It features its own language, called Maherian. This unique language, created by linguists, lets you dive even deeper into the immersive, entrancing world of Shiness.

Taking inspiration from several real-world languages - Japanese, Swahili, French, and more - the Maherian language has its own special grammar, and thousands of words:



Please note that downloading the Maherian Pack will replace all English voice over in the game.

To switch back to English, select Shiness: The Lightning Kingdom in your Steam Library and uninstall the Maherian Pack from the DLC Item list. The English voiceover will then be re-downloaded and available in your game.
